narrative_response: As Eli, I'm inclined to support the policy to remove minimum parking requirements for new apartment developments in Bondi. Given the urban density issues and the need for innovative transport solutions in our area, I believe this policy could pave the way for more sustainable urban living and possibly lower housing costs. However, my support hinges on the implementation of adequate public transport alternatives and infrastructure to support the expected increase in demand. If the policy led to significant congestion or impacted the quality of life due to inadequate transport options, I would reconsider my stance.

suggested_improvements: Enhance public transport services and infrastructure
Increase investment in cycling and pedestrian infrastructure
